description: TSlint target options for Build Facade.
title: TSlint Target

___force.description: Succeeds even if there was linting errors.

___format.description: Output format (prose, json, stylish, verbose, pmd, msbuild, checkstyle, vso, fileslist).

___fix.description: Fixes linting errors (may overwrite linted files).

___tslintConfig.description: The name of the TSLint configuration file.

___tsConfig.description: The name of the TypeScript configuration file.

___typeCheck.description: Controls the type check for linting.
